author: Oliver JJ Lane
title: Return of the Land Army: 26,000+ Britons Sign up to Pick Fruit and Vegetables
description: The recruitment drive came after industry warned a lack of immigrants because of coronavirus would leave vegetables rotting in the fields.
content:
Over 26,000 people have responded to a call for agricultural workers, weeks after the industry warned a lack of immigrants caused by the coronavirus epidemic would leave vegetables rotting in the fields.
Britain’s agricultural industry has long been sustaine… [+4005 chars]
